subject: Account Temporarily Suspended - Action Required 🔒
html:
🔒 Catalytic Computing
Account Suspension Notice
⛔

Account Temporarily Suspended

Reason: {{reason}}

We've temporarily suspended your Catalytic Computing account to protect your data and our platform. This is a precautionary measure that can be quickly resolved.

🔍 What Happened?

Your account was suspended due to: {{reason}}

Common reasons for suspension include:

  • Multiple failed payment attempts
  • Unusual account activity requiring verification
  • Terms of service compliance review
  • Security concerns or suspicious login patterns
  • Technical issues requiring account maintenance

🛡️ Your Data is Safe

Don't worry - your data is completely safe and secure:

  • ✅ All lattice configurations are preserved
  • ✅ Historical performance data is intact
  • ✅ Account settings and customizations are saved
  • ✅ No data will be lost during suspension

🚀 How to Restore Your Account

Step 1: Contact our support team immediately

Step 2: Provide any requested verification or documentation

Step 3: Resolve the underlying issue (payment, verification, etc.)

Step 4: Account access will be restored within 24 hours

Contact Support →

⏰ Next Steps

To restore your account access:

  1. Contact Support Immediately - Our team is standing by to help
  2. Provide Required Information - Help us verify your identity and resolve the issue
  3. Address Root Cause - Work with our team to prevent future suspensions
  4. Resume Normal Operations - Once resolved, full access will be restored

📞 Priority Support

Since your account is suspended, you'll receive priority support to resolve this as quickly as possible. Our team understands the urgency and will work diligently to restore your access.

Support Contact Options:

  • 📧 Email: support@catalyticcomputing.com (monitored 24/7)
  • 🔗 Support Portal: {{contactUrl}}
  • 📱 Emergency Line: Available in your account dashboard

We apologize for any inconvenience and appreciate your patience as we work to resolve this matter quickly.

Thank you for your understanding,
The Catalytic Computing Security & Support Team

Catalytic Computing - Secure & Reliable Computing

Urgent issues? Contact us at support@catalyticcomputing.com

This is an automated security notification.
